item.title: Home 18
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
A Better Way
to Listen

The portable smart speaker for all your listening
adventures. Shop Now

Bluetooth 5.0 for fast, stable connections

Dual audio for stereo sound

Get hands-free with voice control

A seamless listening
experience, everywhere

Automatically connects to your network

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusa

Sound that defies
expectations

Precision-engineered acousticsExcepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem tium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo.

Freedom of control

Mobile App

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehderit in voluptate velit esse

Touch

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehderit in voluptate velit esse

Voice

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehderit in voluptate velit esse

Button

Duis aute irure dolor in reprehderit in voluptate velit esse

12 hours of play time

Powered by a built-in rechargeable battery.Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum. Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste. natus error sit voluptatem tium doloremque laudantium, totam rem

Ultimate Color Combinations

Bring your music
with you

And get 10% off first orderDuis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Shop Now Or Call us at+844 - 1800 3355
